Healthy Salad Recipes

Find healthy, delicious salad recipes including fruit salads, chicken, egg and potato salads, and healthy salad dressings. Healthier Recipes, from the food and nutrition experts at EatingWell.

Vegetarian Taco Salad

You'll never miss the meat in this healthy vegetarian taco salad recipe. Filled with brown rice, beans, cheese and fresh veggies and served with lime wedges and fresh salsa, it has fewer calories and saturated fat than a typical restaurant version.

31 Healthy Salads to Eat This Month

31 days and a salad for each one. These salads are a great way to get more veggies and fiber into your diet while embracing the ingredients of the season.

Healthy Lunch Salad Ideas for Work

Make a filling and healthy salad that will power you through any work day. Full of protein and fiber these quick salads are an easy way to spruce up your lunch.

Fried Chicken Salad with Buttermilk Dres

With this easy (yet impressive) salad, you can have your fried chicken and still get 31 grams of protein all for less than 600 calories.

Healthy Detox Salad

1
Skip the cleanse and eat this instead. Packed with veggies, avocado and seeds, this healthy salad recipe is bursting with vitamins, minerals and antioxidants. Everything can be prepared ahead of time except the avocado. If you love beets, shred one raw and add it to the salad for extra color, crunch and flavor. Excerpted from The Dinner Plan by Kathy Brennan and Caroline Campion, published by ABRAMS © 2017.

Massaged Kale Salad

13
Here a pungent garlicky dressing is infused into kale by massaging the greens and the dressing together with your hands. Any type of kale will work in this kale salad recipe, just remember to remove the tough stems before you start.
ADVERTISEMENT

Roasted Buffalo Chickpea Salad

Soak chickpeas in Buffalo seasoning before roasting in a hot oven for delicious tang and crunch. This crispy topping is the perfect way to add bite to a satisfying salad with celery, carrots and blue cheese.

Quinoa Cilantro Taco Salad

This super-satisfying salad gets a whole-grain boost from cooked quinoa and crumbled whole-grain crackers.

Balsamic Berry Vinaigrette Winter Salad

1
This festive salad features colorful greens, fruit and cheese tossed with a light and zesty dressing.

Edamame Slaw in Lettuce Cups

This festive light vegetarian lunch features protein-rich quinoa and edamame tossed with veggies in an Asian-inspired dressing.

Mediterranean Edamame Toss

Enjoy a superfood lunch with this light and fresh soybean-and-quinoa salad.

Fig & Goat Cheese Salad

The sweet-and-savory combination of the figs and earthy goat cheese will surely satisfy the palate. If you can't find dried figs, try swapping in dried apricots.

Cold Noodle Salad

This Asian-inspired cold noodle salad with peanut butter, snow pea pods, chicken, and bell pepper is easy to make ahead and pack for lunch.
ADVERTISEMENT

Greek-Style Chicken Salad

Transform leftover chicken into a fresh Mediterranean-style salad with bottled vinaigrette, plenty of veggies, feta and olives.

Picnic Bento Lunch

1
Get all the flavors of al fresco dining wherever you are. This easy and healthy packable lunch idea includes all your picnic favorites for a satisfying meal to take to work.

Classic Cobb Mason Jar Salad

1
Pack classic Cobb salad "upside down" in a mason jar for a healthy lunch that won't get soggy while sitting in the fridge all morning. Or pack it up the night before for an easy grab-and-go lunch in the morning.

Watermelon, Olive, Caper & Feta Salad

3
This sweet-and-savory fruit salad recipe is all about the quality of the watermelon: you want its flesh to be really sweet so that all the savory ingredients--the capers, the olives, the feta--shine.

Fried Chicken Salad with Buttermilk Dressing

2
A blend of whole-wheat panko and fine cornmeal gives this healthy chicken recipe the perfect amount of crunch even though it's not deep fried. Making an easy homemade buttermilk ranch dressing recipe means you can skip bottled, which may have additives and stabilizers.

Purple Fruit Salad

1
Serve this refreshing fruit salad featuring juicy plums, grapes and berries on its own or with other colorblock fruit salads (like red, green and orange) for a fun, crowd-pleasing rainbow side dish.
ADVERTISEMENT

Steven Satterfield's Grilled Vidalia Onion, Peach & Arugula Salad

1
For this healthy salad recipe, Chef Satterfield grills the onion in large wedges so the edges are crispy and the centers are soft and sweet. Pair with grilled chicken or pork, or take to a potluck and toss with the vinaigrette just before serving.

Greek-Style Spinach Salad

Turn this healthy spinach salad recipe into a hearty vegetarian dinner with homemade pita chips or boiled potatoes. Look for mild-flavored green garlic at the farmers' market in late spring. Or use 1/4 cup finely chopped scallions plus 1 small minced garlic clove.
ADVERTISEMENT

Tofu, Snow Pea & Carrot Wild Rice Salad

Sesame oil and nori (dried seaweed) give this healthy grain-salad recipe Asian flair. Serve as a vegetarian main dish or as a side for grilled shrimp or baked chicken.

Stetson Chopped Salad

Knock it out of the park at dinner with this composed salad recipe inspired by the crazy-popular Stetson Chopped Salad at Cowboy Ciao in Scottsdale, Arizona. It packs in colorful vegetables and a variety of textures from whole grains, seeds and a creamy homemade dressing for a photo-worthy, healthy meal. Keep it vegetarian or add smoked salmon or roasted chicken.
ADVERTISEMENT

Spiralized Mediterranean Cucumber Salad

2
Save time and spiralize crisp cucumber instead of chopping it for this easy, healthy vegetable side. Want to make it a meal? Just add grilled chicken, shrimp or canned chickpeas.

Little Gem Wedge Salad with Blue Cheese & Herb Dressing

Little Gem lettuce is like a cross between romaine and butterhead. It's perfect for making an updated take on the wedge salad in this healthy recipe. If you can't find Little Gem, use half a romaine heart for each serving. You can order Point Reyes Original blue cheese online from pointreyescheese.com or substitute another raw-milk blue cheese.

Spring Roll Salad

2
All the tastes, color and fun of a spring roll without all the work! This healthy salad recipe is bursting with the colors of rainbow from generous amounts of fresh vegetables, shrimp and whole grains all topped with a peanut dressing for the ultimate satisfying salad.

Romaine Salad with Grapefruit & Shrimp

1
The burst-in-your-mouth juicy sweetness of red grapefruit is a great partner for the slightly briny and chewy bite of cooked shrimp. In this healthy salad recipe, we use romaine lettuce and red cabbage, but a handful of peppery arugula or watercress would be a nice addition.

Winter Salad with Halloumi “Croutons”

1
Halloumi, a firm Greek cheese, softens but doesn't completely melt when heated. In this healthy recipe, halloumi is cubed, marinated and broiled, turning it into crouton-like bites to top this hearty vegetarian main-dish salad.
ADVERTISEMENT

Garden Pasta Salad

21
This lightly dressed pasta salad gets lots of flavor from Kalamata olives and basil. A colorful mix of diced bell pepper, shredded carrot and tomatoes adds vitamins and minerals. Serve on a crisp bed of greens. Toss in canned chunk light tuna, cooked chicken or flavored baked tofu to add protein and make it more substantial.

Avocado & Shrimp Chopped Salad

8
The smoky flavors of grilled shrimp and corn in this healthy chopped salad recipe are a tasty match for the creamy cilantro dressing.

Composed Bean Salad with Basil Vinaigrette

4
Channel your inner food stylist while arranging the beans and vegetables for this show-stopping composed bean salad recipe. Serve at a potluck or for a beautiful salad at brunch alongside grilled chicken, scallops or fish.

Pineapple & Avocado Salad

3
This refreshing, simple Cuban salad recipe captures the flavors of the tropics. Serve alongside spiced chicken or pork, with rice and beans.

Broccoli-Bacon Salad

37
A picnic favorite, this salad combines broccoli, water chestnuts, cranberries and just a little bacon for delicious results. Our version has plenty of creaminess without all the fat. Make it once and it will become a regular on your backyard barbecue menu.

Classic Dill Chicken Salad

1
We lightened up the creamy dressing in this healthy chicken salad recipe with a combo of mayonnaise and plain Greek yogurt. Dill, grapes, celery and walnuts make up this classic chicken salad but feel free to experiment with your favorite fruit, vegetables and herbs. Serve it open-face on toasted bread or scoop it on top of fresh salad greens.

Southwestern Salad with Black Beans

13
Here we top salad greens with black beans, sweet corn and grape tomatoes and bring it all together with a tangy avocado-lime dressing for a Mexican-inspired salad. Try this salad for a take-along lunch. To keep the salad greens from getting soggy, pack the greens, salad toppings and dressing in separate containers and toss them together just before eating.

Vietnamese Spiralized Sesame Noodles with Scallops

1
Spiralized zucchini noodles are the base for this healthy sesame noodle recipe. Shrimp or baked tofu can be swapped for the scallops if you prefer.

Thai Curry & Pork Sesame Noodles

1
Thai curry paste, a flavorful combination of chiles, lemongrass, galangal (similar to ginger), garlic and kaffir lime leaves, adds a jolt of flavor to this healthy sesame noodles recipe. Green, red and yellow curry paste are pretty interchangeable but green is the hottest, red is medium and yellow is mild. Be sure to rinse the rice noodles until they're cold, then give them a good shake in the colander until they're well drained. Are you a spiralizing pro? Swap 5 cups of raw zucchini, carrot or other veggie “noodles” for the cooked pasta.

Rainbow Slaw with Beet Greens

A touch of cumin and cinnamon give this colorful, healthy slaw recipe a hint of the Middle East. Serve with a wedge of cheese and a whole-grain roll on the side for a satisfying dinner--or with just about anything that comes off the grill.

Heirloom Tomato & Summer Vegetable Salad

1
Allowing the salad to sit for at least 30 minutes before serving means the raw vegetables get a chance to soak up the tangy-sweet dressing in this healthy side dish recipe. Serve with grilled chicken, steak, mushrooms or tofu.

Curried Chicken Salad

Chilling the poached chicken breasts in the cooking liquid ensures moist, succulent results in this curried chicken salad. Stuff into whole-wheat pita pockets with shredded lettuce.

Bacony Barley Salad with Marinated Shrimp

5
Here's a great example of how to cook a healthy dish in minutes--simply cook the bacon in the same pan as the barley to enrich the flavor, add some purchased cooked shrimp, a few aromatic vegetables, and you've got dinner (or a hearty potluck dish) in no time flat.

Creamy Potato Salad

14
Tossing potatoes with a little good vinegar while they are still warm infuses them with flavor. Capers, gherkins and a touch of anchovy give this old-fashioned salad a piquant finish, while red bell pepper and celery give it an appealing crunch.
ADVERTISEMENT

Orange, Anchovy & Olive Salad

2
This delightful Italian salad recipe brings together oranges, olives and anchovies. Beautiful and refreshing, this simple salad can easily be made ahead. Serve as a first course or with roasted chicken.

Smoked Trout, Potato & Arugula Salad for Two

In this sophisticated dinner salad recipe, tender, new potatoes and early summer arugula add a dynamic duo of creamy and peppery texture and flavor to the smokiness of the trout. You can hard-boil the eggs ahead of time, but in a pinch, just add them into the pot with the cooking potatoes. They're just as tasty served warm in this salad.

Orange-Sesame Shrimp Salad

In this healthy Asian-inspired shrimp salad recipe, two types of greens--romaine lettuce and red cabbage--pair beautifully with the avocado and shrimp. Use extra dressing for another salad or as a sauce for baked fish.

Curried Scallop-Apple Salad

3
Curry complements seared scallops, tart apples and sweet dried cranberries while toasted almonds add crunch in this quick fall dinner salad. Serve with toasted whole-wheat baguette and a glass of sauvignon blanc.
ADVERTISEMENT

Blue Cheese & Bacon Potato Salad

In this healthy potato salad recipe, a white-wine vinaigrette dresses the potatoes, green beans, blue cheese and bacon. Waxy potatoes, such as red and yellow, make the best potato salad because they hold their shape when cooked. Keep the potato skins on for more fiber and potassium.

Curried Potato Salad

In this healthy and creamy potato salad recipe, yogurt replaces half of the mayo and we keep the potato skins on for more fiber and potassium. Red bell pepper and green peas add even more color to the yellow-tinted potato salad.

Mixed Green Salad with Tarragon Vinaigrette

1
In this simple green side salad recipe, white-wine vinegar, tarragon and Dijon mustard are whisked together to make a bright, signature dressing. Serve with grilled chicken, steak or shrimp, and fresh tomatoes.

Burnt Orange & Escarole Salad

The oranges in this healthy salad recipe are caramelized in honey and not actually “burnt.” The result is a citrus flavor that's more complex than just slicing the fruit onto your greens. Serve with roasted chicken, turkey or ham.

Spring Radish Salad

Let beautiful spring radishes shine in this simple radish salad recipe. Look for colorful radishes, such as watermelon radishes, French breakfast radishes, Easter egg radishes and green radishes at your local farmers' market and make sure to use your best-quality olive oil.
ADVERTISEMENT

Moroccan Lentil Salad

1
This healthy date, carrot and lentil salad recipe is flavored with a spiced preserved-lemon dressing. While most salads taste best when freshly assembled, lentil salads appreciate time for the flavors to marry so try to make it at least a few hours ahead if you can. Bring the salad to room temperature before serving and adjust salt if needed.

Citrus Salad with Olives & Radicchio

1
This tangy winter salad recipe combines oranges and grapefruit with flavorful bitter greens. Green olives and a sprinkling of Manchego or feta cheese top off this delicious salad.

Smoked Trout Salad with Herb & Horseradish Dressing

Smoked trout tops heart-shaped watercress and mixed greens tossed with creamy horseradish dressing in this protein-packed appetizer salad.

Escarole & Roasted Vegetable Salad with Anchovy-Garlic Vinaigrette

Roasted cauliflower, potatoes and artichokes get a quick marinade in the garlicky dressing while hot to add extra flavor in this healthy salad recipe. Don't skip the breadcrumbs--they're the secret to making this salad special.

Moroccan Kidney Bean & Chickpea Salad

3
The bold flavors of the lemon-cumin dressing in this healthy bean salad recipe make it a wonderful side dish to grilled beef and lamb, yet it's also a stellar meatless main when served with whole-wheat couscous.
ADVERTISEMENT

Mixed Green Salad with Pomegranate, Dates & Bacon

1
Jewel-like pomegranate seeds star along with bacon, tangy clementines and sweet dates in this mixed green salad recipe. To make it a dinner salad, top with chicken, shrimp or pan-seared salmon.

Pear & Arugula Salad with Candied Walnuts

1
This pear and arugula salad recipe is topped with homemade candied walnuts, which are incredibly easy to make in the oven. For a touch of heat, add a pinch of ground chipotle or cayenne to the walnuts before baking.

Chimichurri Grilled Steak Salad

3
Chimichurri sauce is a zingy Argentinean sauce made with garlic, parsley, vinegar and oil. Here chimichurri sauce doubles as marinade for flank steak and as salad dressing for this grilled steak salad recipe.

Jicama & Cucumber Salad with Red Chile Dressing

1
This salad combines cucumber and jicama with a sweet-sour, slightly spicy vinaigrette and makes a great start to any Mexican-inspired meal.

Egg Salad

4
Try this easy egg salad on your favorite multigrain bread or on top of lightly dressed salad greens.

Sugar Snap Salad

Sweet, edible-podded peas make a bright, crisp and colorful salad, which is easily varied by substituting shallots for scallions or adding asparagus to the mix.

Warm Potato Salad with Bacon-Mustard Dressing

3
This updated take on German potato salad is a sophisticated addition to any holiday spread. Granny Smith apples are a good choice, as they hold their shape when roasted.

Mixed Green Salad with Grapefruit & Cranberries

3
Grapefruit juice is the base for the tangy vinaigrette on this salad studded with grapefruit segments and dried cranberries. It serves 12 as a starter or about 6 if you'd like a large portion per person.

Melon Panzanella

Traditional panzanella, Italian bread salad, was the inspiration for this dish. This variation uses sweet, ripe melon instead of tomatoes, plus peppery arugula and a touch of sizzled prosciutto to complement the taste of the melon. Try firm-textured orange- or green-fleshed melons, such as honeydew, casaba, cantaloupe or Galia. We even like it with watermelon.

Grapefruit, Hearts of Palm & Shrimp Salad

Serve this grapefruit, hearts of palm and shrimp salad for lunch or as an appetizer. This shrimp salad recipe is low in calories, light and satisfying. Hearts of palm are the tender inner stem of certain species of palm trees, with a flavor similar to artichokes. Find them near other canned vegetables.

Rhubarb Fruit Salad

2
Rhubarb cooked with a little honey and orange liqueur makes a bright, tangy “sauce” to toss with grapes, melon, mango and strawberries.

Green Papaya Salad

3
This Thai-inspired salad makes use of the papayas that grow throughout Hawaii. This version is tossed with tender, sweet pea shoots. Make an extra batch of the vinaigrette to keep on hand in the refrigerator--use it as a marinade for vegetables, a flavorful dressing for fresh melon or as a sauce to splash over grilled fish or chicken.

Bold Winter Greens Salad

For this cousin of the Caesar salad use a combination of winter greens, such as radicchio and escarole; the anchovies and lemon juice temper their bitterness. Vary the amount of garlic and anchovy according to your preference.

EatingWell Power Salad

4
Here's our take on a traditional chef's salad, which is anything but light fare when it's heaped with meats and cheeses. Our version keeps the satisfaction factor with lean turkey breast and reduced-fat Swiss cheese--and adds plenty of colorful vegetables to the mix.
ADVERTISEMENT

Lebanese Potato Salad

6
?Dressed with a tangy lemon vinaigrette and fresh mint, this invigorating--and dairy-free--potato salad makes the perfect summer potluck contribution.

Spring Salad with Peas & Frizzled Shallots

This simple spring salad recipe combines red leaf lettuce and frisee with fresh peas and crispy fried shallots tossed with a light tarragon-infused vinaigrette dressing. The fried shallots give this salad an out-of-this-world flavor. And compared with store-bought fried onions, they have half the calories and a fraction of the saturated fat and sodium.

Massaged Broccoli Rabe Salad

1
In this broccoli rabe salad recipe, the dressing is massaged into the leaves and florets, virtually eliminating its bitter undertones.

Fresh Herb & Snap Pea Salad

Quickly cooked snap peas retain their distinctive crunch, becoming the star in this simple green salad.

Warm Arugula Bread Salad

3
This assertive panzanella has the most flavor when made with mature arugula, but baby arugula also works well. Serve with grilled steak or turkey sausage.

Steak Salad-Stuffed Pockets

1
Here's a healthy dinner on the go, an easy sandwich you can pack up and take in the car when you're rushing the kids off to soccer or band. It's also a quick favorite when the adults just want to hang out on the deck on Saturday night with a pitcher of sangria on the side.

Asian Chicken Salad

9
Crunchy vegetables and tender chicken breasts tossed in a tangy vinaigrette make a refreshing main-dish salad. If you poach the chicken yourself, reserve 3/4 cup of the cooking liquid to make the dressing.

Smoked Salmon Salad Nicoise

3
Este giro en una salade clásica Niçoise utiliza salmón ahumado en lugar de atún y agrega vegetales adicionales en lugar de huevos duros y aceitunas. Encantador sirve como un almuerzo no tradicional, almuerzo especial de fin de semana o cena ligera.

Ensalada de renacimiento griego

1
Este atractivo plato con mucho cuerpo celebra los sabores griegos de queso feta, aceitunas negras y abundante orégano.

Ensalada de frambuesa, aguacate y mango

6
Las bayas hechas puré dan al aderezo de vinagre de vino picante una textura cremosa que se adhiere suavemente a la lechuga y la fruta. Esta es una ensalada para disfrutar cuando las bayas frescas están en el mercado.

Ensalada de pasta de pollo y arándanos

dieciséis
Sí, arándanos y pasta. La adición de pollo escalfado y queso feta hace que este plato se convierta en una cena de verano ligera y satisfactoria que también es ideal para una cena informal. Si ya tiene un pollo sobrante, omita el Paso 1 y agregue el pollo desmenuzado en el Paso 4.

Ensalada de invierno caliente para dos

La radicchio salteado, el hinojo y las zanahorias se cubren con pollo, nueces y gorgonzola en esta ensalada caliente y abundante plato principal. Servir con baguette crujiente de grano entero.

Ensalada de tomate, atún y estragón

Los tomates y el atún estaban hechos el uno para el otro, y el estragón fresco sella el trato. Remojar la cebolla en agua fría calma el calor y endulza su sabor.

Ensalada de cordero mediterránea

Aquí hay un ejemplo de la simplicidad cotidiana llevada a las alturas elegantes: una encantadora ensalada de garbanzos y verduras, cubierta con cálidas tiras de cordero. Abundante pero ligera para una noche cálida, esta cena podría seguirse con lichis Lychees.

Ensalada de berros y salsa de azúcar con vinagreta de ajonjolí sésamo tibia

2
En esta ensalada de inspiración asiática, el sabor a pimienta del berro se combina con otro vegetal emblemático de primavera: los guisantes de azúcar. Mezclado con un aderezo caliente hecho con cebolla caramelizada, vinagre de arroz y aceite de sésamo tostado, esta ensalada es el antídoto perfecto para el frío de la primavera. Para obtener el berro de mejor sabor, busque tallos flexibles y delgados (no tallos leñosos) con hojas pequeñas, en forma de corazón, de color verde oscuro que no tengan manchas amarillas.

Ensalada de col mexicana

17
Disfruta de esta alternativa crujiente y refrescante a la ensalada de col a base de mayonesa en un taco o en un costado.

Jicama-Apple Slaw

1
Zanahoria rallada, zanahorias y manzanas Granny Smith mezcladas con una vinagreta de sidra agridulce es un plato sabroso para las barbacoas de verano. Haga que sea una comida: sirva junto con los palitos de pollo dulce y amargo.

Ensalada de espinacas con aderezo de arce caliente

5
El jarabe de arce puro, a diferencia del jarabe de panqueque con sabor artificial y coloreado, es un extraordinario ingrediente para cocinar. Aquí agrega cuerpo y rico sabor al aderezo, proporcionando un contrapunto perfecto para el queso ahumado.

Ensalada de camarones y piña jamaicanos Jerk

1
Las notas dulces, agrias y picantes producen aquí una cautivadora mezcla de sabores.

Sándwiches de cerdo a la barbacoa y ensalada de col

2
Dos favoritos del sur se combinan aquí: carne de cerdo en salsa de barbacoa dulce y ensalada de col crujiente.

Ensalada de nueces, eneldo y atún

¿Buscas una nueva forma de vestir tu rutina de ensalada de atún? Pruebe nueces ricas en antioxidantes y eneldo fresco. Haga una comida: sirva sobre rúcula bebé y rodajas de tomate con una rebanada de pan de grano entero.

Espárrago Tabbouleh

1
Las semillas de espárragos y granadas son un complemento divertido para esta sencilla receta tabbouleh. Sirva este lado integral sano con kebabs de pollo, tzatziki y pan de pita para una cena inspirada en Oriente Medio.

Ensalada de desayuno Baby Kale con trucha ahumada y aguacate

Kale para el desayuno? ¡Oh si! Comience bien el día con una receta de ensalada de desayuno llena de verduras sabrosas y eliminará la mitad de su cuota diaria de verduras con la primera comida del día.

White Bean Spread con Veggie Slaw

Convierta los frijoles enlatados en un almuerzo rápido y saludable con esta sencilla receta sin gluten. Use su aderezo para ensaladas favorito, como una vinagreta italiana o francesa, como una forma conveniente de agregar sabor a los frijoles molidos. Llene las galletas sin gluten y la extensión de frijoles con cualquier combinación de vegetales crudos rallados que tenga a mano.

Ensalada de pollo al pesto italiano

2
El pesto preparado es el ingrediente secreto en esta receta de ensaladas de pollo cremosa y saludable. Para obtener el aderezo más bonito, elija un pesto de color verde brillante. Sirva la ensalada cara abierta sobre pan tostado o empújela sobre verduras frescas para ensalada.

Romaine a la parrilla con aderezo de aguacate y lima

La lechuga romana adquiere un agradable sabor ahumado y ahumado con un rápido viaje a la parrilla en esta receta saludable de ensalada de cuña. El aguacate hace que el aderezo sea cremoso y sin crema. Sirva junto con pollo o pescado a la parrilla.

Ensalada de mandarina y remolacha asada con queso feta y pistachos

2

    • 31 Ensaladas saludables para comer este mes

    31 días y una ensalada para cada uno. Estas ensaladas son una excelente manera de obtener más verduras y fibra en su dieta mientras abraza los ingredientes de la temporada. Son una comida satisfactoria perfecta para el almuerzo o la cena.

    • Ensaladas llenas de productos para personas a las que no les gusta la lechuga

    ¿No estás de humor para los verdes? No hay problema. Pruebe estas recetas de ensaladas saludables y sin lechuga para su próxima cena o barbacoa en el patio trasero.

Panko-Crusted Pork Chops with Asian Slaw

Panko breadcrumbs and a high-heat oven lend satisfying crispiness to pork chops without frying. The miso-flavored chops pair with coleslaw, here updated with snow peas, red bell pepper and Asian flavors like ginger, to round out this healthy 400-calorie meal that's ready in under an hour.

Farro Salad with Cranberries & Persimmons

1
When shopping for this healthy salad recipe, be sure to pick up the right type of persimmons. The flat-bottomed Fuyus called for here are bright orange and have texture of an almost-ripe peach when ready to eat--perfect for salsas and salads, with or without the peel. Oval-shaped, darker orange and larger Hachiyas are only edible when almost liquid on the inside. The flesh is best used in baking or can be scooped out of the skin and eaten like custard. Underripe, they are off-puttingly tart.

Asparagus Salad with Eggs & Jambon de Bayonne

This impressive-looking asparagus salad recipe is actually very easy to make. After quickly boiling the asparagus, the same water is used to soft-boil the eggs. Piment d'Espelette is a sweet, spicy ground pepper from the Basque region of France. While it's not essential, it does add a subtle kick to the otherwise mellow flavors of this salad. Look for this spice at specialty stores and well-stocked markets--or substitute smoked paprika.

Vietnamese Grapefruit & Pork Salad (Pork Goi Buoi)

Goi buoi is a Vietnamese salad typically made with pomelo, a thick-skinned but super-sweet citrus fruit. In this healthy salad recipe, we use grapefruit because it's easier to find. Plus, it lends a tangy, acidic flavor to balance the vegetables.

San Francisco Crab Louis

Ensalada de huevo Cobb

4
El tocino, el queso azul y el aguacate en esta ensalada de huevo lo hacen decadente. Servirlo con la cara abierta en una pieza de pan integral tostado.

Ensalada rosada de pomelo y aguacate

3
Esta es una ensalada de ocasión especial que combina segmentos de pomelo con aguacate cremoso, cebolla roja picante, semillas de granada crujiente y albahaca Herby aromática. Busque toronjas con una piel firme y brillante que sea pesada para su tamaño, lo que significa que tendrá mucho jugo. Guarde la toronja por 1 semana a temperatura ambiente o 1 mes en el refrigerador.

Ensalada calurosa de col rizada

4
Un riff en la clásica ensalada caliente de espinaca y tocino, esta receta presenta finas cintas de col rizada. Cualquier variedad de col rizada funciona, pero la latola kale de hoja más plana la hace extra especial.

Roasted New Potatoes & Green Beans

8
Whoever said potato salad needs to be cold? For this warm version, new potatoes are roasted right alongside green beans, then tossed in a tangy champagne vinegar and Gorgonzola dressing. If you like, you can toss in some baby arugula.

Radish, Celery & Snap Pea Salad

1
This stunning spring salad, full of peppery radishes, sliced celery, celery leaves and crunchy snap peas, is perfect for entertaining. If you grow your own celery, you'll have plenty of leaves to work with. But we found that most store-bought celery yielded enough leaves for this recipe if you combine the dark outer leaves with the pale yellow inner leaves at the heart. If you can't collect enough celery leaves, make up the difference with extra parsley. The results will still be delicious.

Miso-Garlic-Roasted Tofu Caesar Salad

2
En esta abundante versión de la clásica ensalada de lechuga romana, el miso cumple una función doble como adobo para el tofu tostado y una capa rica y sabrosa en el aderezo. Hay muchas variedades de miso disponibles, pero la dulzura suave y sutil del miso de arroz integral es lo suficientemente discreta como para mezclarse con el aderezo de limón mientras deja que los sabores del aceite de oliva se filtren, y lo suficientemente rico como para agregarle carácter a los demás. Jane tofu.

Ensalada de tomate inspirada en el español

4
Esta simple ensalada, cubierta con crujientes migas de pan de ajo, es el vehículo perfecto para exhibir una mezcla única y colorida de tomates: cualquier tamaño, forma o color será delicioso. Mientras que el vinagre de jerez le da un toque especial, el vinagre de vino tinto también funciona.

Ensalada de guisantes, naranja y jícama

Esta ensalada de guisantes, naranjas y jícama es dulce, agria y llena de crujiente.

Ensalada griega con sardinas

dieciséis
Los elementos frescos y ácidos de una ensalada griega - tomate, pepino, queso feta, aceitunas y vinagreta al limón - combinan bien con sardinas de sabor intenso. Busque sardinas con piel y huesos (que sean comestibles) ya que tienen más de cuatro veces la cantidad de calcio que las sardinas sin piel y sin huesos. Si tiene la suerte de tener sardinas frescas disponibles en su supermercado, pruébelas en lugar de las sardinas enlatadas. Ligeramente dragarlos en harina condimentada con sal y pimienta y saltearlos en un poco de aceite de oliva.

Ensalada de brócoli Rabe y Orzo

4
El limón, el orégano y el feta agregan zing al brócoli rabe mezclado con orzo de trigo integral.

Ensalada de zanahoria con aderezo de miel y limón

2
Aquí combinamos las zanahorias y la raíz de apio (también conocida como apio nabo) en una ensalada rápida rallada. Pruébalo como un cambio de una ensalada verde mixta común.

Ensalada griega picada con pollo para dos

12
Haga una cena de clima cálido sobre la mesa rápidamente con esta ensalada de pollo de inspiración griega. Siéntase libre de sustituir otras verduras frescas picadas, como el brócoli o los pimientos, por los tomates o el pepino. Use pollo sobrante, pollo asado en la tienda o saque rápidamente un par de pechugas de pollo deshuesadas y sin piel mientras prepara el resto de la ensalada. Sirve con pan de pita y hummus.

Ensalada de salmón

2
Sal de tu rutina de ensalada de atún y prueba la ensalada de salmón para variar. Esta versión está enriquecida con aceitunas, limón, cebolla y alcaparras.

Ensalada de quinoa tostada con vieiras y guisantes de nieve

42
Esta ensalada de quinoa tachonada de vieiras obtiene una textura excitante de guisantes crujientes, pimiento rojo y cebolletas. Siéntase libre de sustituir camarones o lonchas finas de pollo por las vieiras.

Ensalada verde picante con soja y aderezo de ajo asado

1
Los verdes picantes, como mizuna y mostaza roja, se suavizan con un aderezo dulce y salado que incluye una cabeza entera de ajo asado. Agregue un pincho de gambas a la parrilla o teriyaki para convertirlo en un plato principal. Para suavizar las hojas, caliente el aderezo justo antes de servir y vierta sobre los vegetales.

7
Esta ensalada tibia de espinacas y remolacha está inspirada en un plato de Penny Cluse Café en Burlington, Vermont. Si tiene remolachas cocidas a mano, puede tenerlas listas en solo unos minutos.

Ensalada verde con espárragos y guisantes (Salat med asparges og rter)

3
Aquí hay una ensalada donde hemos combinado dos estrellas del jardín de primavera, espárragos y guisantes. Dado que los espárragos entran en la mezcla en crudo, querrás buscar las lanzas más frescas y tiernas que puedas encontrar y cortarlas en rodajas muy finas.

This main-dish chicken salad has bright flavors of tarragon in a creamy blue cheese dressing with just a touch of sweetness from honey.

Roasted Garlic Potato Salad

3
Though it tastes rich and creamy, this potato salad is made with nonfat yogurt and reduced-fat mayonnaise, making it much lower in fat than a traditional potato salad. Roasted garlic adds a rich dimension.

1
Saltear restos de repollo rallado con manzanas en rodajas finas es un acompañamiento rápido y satisfactorio para el clima frío. Intente servirlo junto con su salchicha de pollo favorita y una variedad de mostazas.

4
Los sabores amargos, dulces y picantes se combinan bien en esta ensalada tipo confeti de frutas y verduras hivernales.

Ensalada de Romaine con naranja, feta y frijoles

2
Agregar frijoles enlatados es una forma rápida y conveniente de hacer una ensalada en una comida: aumentan la proteína para que la ensalada sea más satisfactoria. Esta receta requiere frijoles, pero otros frijoles enlatados como cannellinis o frijoles negros también funcionarían muy bien.

1
Estas galletas ultrafinas y crujientes son muy fáciles de preparar y tienen un sabor inspirado en las galletas de la fortuna. Sirva junto con una ensalada de fruta casera o comprada para aumentar las porciones de fruta durante el día mientras satisface a los golosos.

Ensalada de taco

20
Una mezcla superrápida de crema agria y salsa con bajo contenido graso cumple una doble función como aliño de ensaladas y condimentos para la carne en nuestra versión actualizada de la ensalada de tacos Tex-Mex. Dependiendo del tipo de salsa que use, la ensalada variará en celo. Mantenemos esta versión ligera con pavo magro, pero la carne de res magra (aproximadamente 95%) también mantendría las marcas nutricionales razonables. Simplemente sostenga el tazón de tortilla frito y en su lugar sirva esta ensalada con totopos horneados y trozos de lima fresca.

Tofu a la plancha con ensalada mediterránea picada

6
